function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Direct access to real-time epidemiological data can lead to misinformation and panic if the data is not accurate or properly interpreted.","Impact":"Misguided public health measures, unnecessary anxiety among the public, and misallocation of resources.","Mitigation":"Implementing data validation processes, providing clear guidelines for data interpretation, and promoting media literacy.","Technologies":"Data validation algorithms, machine learning for data analysis, and data visualization tools.","People":"Public, scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Public health agencies, data scientists, and media organizations"}]}
